transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aawaz aa raha hai, hello?
Customer: Haan, aawaz aa raha hai, ma'am. Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan, sir aap Rafiqul sir hai line pe?
Customer: Haan, line pe hu, boliye.
Executive: Nahi hai, hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Aap Nasim Nasim bol rahe ho?
Executive: Haan, mai Nasim bol raha hu. Mai unke paas gaya tha, unke saath baat kiya hu mai. Mai baki jo aapko dikkat ho raha hai, woh refund nahi mangega, mai baat kar kar le raha hu.
Executive: Refund mangne wali baat nahi hai, woh use kar rahe hai services ko. Hai na? Woh yeh bol rahe hai ki Nasim ne mujhse bola hai ki refund mil jayega.
Executive: Theek hai, mai unke saath baat kar liya hu. Nahi milega, woh maine unke saath baat kar liya hu. Unke paas mai gaya tha. Theek hai. Haan. Baat karke aaya hu mai. Close kar rahi hu mai yaha pe.
Customer: Haan? Unhone concern raise kiya hai 9696 pe call karke toh phir unse bolo ki phir mai yaha pe concern close kar deti hu unse baat karke.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai, mai unko bol dunga. Line pe baat ho rahi hai sari unse toh meri.
Customer: Theek hai, mai unko bol de raha hu baat karke. Haan, aap boliye. Theek, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the services.

Resolution:

- Executive clarified refund will not be processed.

- Executive will inform the customer about the same.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, services, concern
